today's video is sponsored by a return

the more popular risk your life game

a classic and refined take on the most

in class creation spread across 14
different types a flushed out skill and
non-target combat system that allows for
a versatile yet simple gameplay
experience then numerous quests weapons

exotic open-world
not to mention the action-packed faction

you reach level 40 which really only
